website_summaries.verdict: Easy to install and operate, with a very simple design. Has multiple uses but is ideal for bunk beds and loft beds.
pros: Easily twist and lock the clamp on this tray on the side of your bed
Great for when you need an extra bit of storage space, or if you are on the top bunk and can't install a shelf
Simple heavyweight plastic design is easy to clean
cons: Not useful for beds with very thick frames or rounded metal frames

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect I was recently diagnosed with sleep apnea and needed a place to put my cpap machine I didn't have room for a traditional side table but the did the trick I can easily fit my machine my cell phone and my glasses on this table.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McGuffin

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but cheaply made and too small
customer_reviews.text: The space between clamps was about 1/2" too small for my situation. It says the clamp is 2", but the space between the clamp is only about 1.5" so will only fit bed frames 1.5" or smaller. I was also disappointed at what a cheap piece of plastic it was for such a high cost. Returning item.
customer_reviews.author: coastalrn

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with IKEA metal bunk bed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect four my kids' Ikea metal bunkbed. You can't put anything too heavy on it, but it is very sturdy. It fits on the frame, just below the bars (level with the bottom of the mattress). My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: soigne

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf for my daughter's bunk bed
customer_reviews.text: Great shelf for my daughter's bunk bed! She just got a bunk bed and we were wondering how to keep her kleenex and water on the top bunk with her. This is great! It was easy to put up and seems to hold quite a bit. Only issue I had was that the shelf came in white, instead of black (like shown).... I'm not sure if I missed that detail when I bought it, but something to check when ordering. Other than that, we LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: HTCuillier

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty cool, My son loves it and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cool , My son loves it and it has served it's purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband because he doesn't have a nightstand next to his side of the bed. He puts his phone on here and headphones during the night for charging. He loves it! The only thing that would make this product better, hence the 4 stars, would be to have some kind of soft material that would prevent phone vibrations from making noise. We fixed this by putting a hand towel on there, but it would be nice for it to include this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Stela

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise we're happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was a tight fit on my son's Ikea bunk bed, but now that it's on he loves having a little spot to put his water bottle and other nighttime items. It came with a big sticker/label on the tray, which has left behind a sticky residue I can't get off...why do companies always do that??? Otherwise we're happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Welton

customer_reviews.title: Great for bunks.
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these gifted to our family and we have a set a bunk beds. It worked so well on the top bunk that I wanted one for the bottom bunk. I looked on Amazon to find this product priced double what they paid for the original (price tag was left on from Menard's). But they are sturdy and if you wanted you could double for an even larger table. They are designed with lips to prevent items from falling off and the clamps that attach them to the bed are sturdy. I like that it give you some freedom for bed placement too--you don't have to worry if there is enough room for your bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Saavik

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works as advertised, price may be a little high but haven’t found anything better
customer_reviews.text: It’s a simple product, but it works well. I liked it so much that I have six of them. They can bear a decent bit of weight (I’ve definitely left a few textbooks on one, and it’s been fine). The gross margins on this are probably astronomical, but hey, I haven’t found anything comparable at a lower price point so no stars off for that (if I do, maybe 4 stars for the price). The white ones can stain if stuff is spilled on them, so I suggest going with a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Sai Parepally

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dorm Rooms
customer_reviews.text: Though this piece of plastic is way too expensive, it is well worth it. I got it for my dorm room bed, which I trundled above my roommates. It's large enough to hold my 13" laptop and generally also put my phone and water bottle in it. I'll continue using it for a very long time! Super useful.
customer_reviews.author: ICONMAKER

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a dorm
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for a college dorm . Especially if the bed is lofted.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Robidoux

customer_reviews.title: this item is far superior than any other we've tried
customer_reviews.text: After trying several products and looking multiple places for a bedside stand for my sons lofted bed, this item is far superior than any other we've tried. It can hold multiple books AND a full glass of water with no problem. Incredibly sturdy and easy to place. My son and I are both thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: LPB

customer_reviews.title: Great bedside shelf
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different brand a couple months ago, but it arrived with a carcinogen warning. Nope. This one is made of plastic, so hopefully the lack of label wasn't an accident. The shelf works great. Holds a sturdy lamp and a couple books, no sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bedside shelf table.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy and made well. It can clearly hold heavy items. It did not fit on the side of the dorm bed because the frame was too thick on the bed, so we attached it to the head of the bed and it works well. I mistakenly gave this item 1 star and said that the pieces were not all in the box which is incorrect. That review and rating was for a different bedside buddy shelf but the Amazon site would not let me remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these for our son, who is temporarily using a bunk bed that he can't modify, so attaching a wooden shelf was out of the question. He likes it enough that we got him a second one. Note that he's using these for small items - glasses, wallet, phone, etc., and I doubt they would work as well for large or heavy things. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: eliza

customer_reviews.title: A bit unsteady but ultimately useful.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a loft bed and cant get a tall desk close enough to your bed, you need something like this. Because of the way my bed was set up, I have this holding on to a circular rail instead of a bigger part of the frame, which is why I saw it's a bit lopsided, but it keeps a tissue box, my phone, and a few other small objects way closer to reach than I could have them otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Emily Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter who sleeps on the top bunk. Her sister has one so she wanted one as well. She loves it. It's excellent quality and is easy to put on. It's perfect for her to lay her glasses on at night before falling asleep. It also holds her cellphone, etc. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: kwolff

customer_reviews.title: Love it, use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Love it, use it all the time. I live in a tiny apartment so I need all the extra space I can get and this definitely helps since I'm the top bunk. It fits a lamp, my phone and waterbottle without fear of any of them being knocked off the table. Love it and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nhu

customer_reviews.title: Wrong one
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t see it described as specifically made only for a bunk bed. Really trying to find one for a normal bed. Cute concept but returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgysmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items you don’t know you needed until you have it. When I rearranged my bedroom I lost space beside my bed to place my nightstand on one side, but I needed somewhere to put my glasses at night. It took me forever to find one for the right price, and I’m glad I took my time. It’s sturdy, small yet big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf if you have no place for a nightstand
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to an apartment and there isn't much room next to my bed and I can't really fit a nightstand and didn't want to drill holes for a ledge so anyways this is great. Fits well attached to me bed and so far it's holding everything I put on there: cell phone, book, bottle of water, remote, glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for loft bed
customer_reviews.text: My son has a loft bed and need a shelf to put his drink on at night. We didn't want him to ruin his wood shelf (water rings and water swelling), so he got this. It's strong, holds quite a lot, and has a great lip to prevent stuff from falling off. This is a real winner!
customer_reviews.author: Scoli

customer_reviews.title: Great product and outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is great and very sturdy. One screw arrived bent and could not be tightened. The manufacturer was contacted and two replacement arrived within a few days. Outstanding product, even better customer service. I will be buying more in the future as graduation gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy! A great find!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 7 yr old who sleeps on the top bunk. It’s plastic, sturdy, and holds several books, a nighttime water glass, and a few trinkets. Fastened on easily. Coupled with a flexible gooseneck lamp clipped on the bed frame, it makes for a great setup. He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old has this attached to his upper bunk. This is exactly what I was looking for - a sturdy tray with lip to hold his book, snack, drink, remote control, or whatever small toy he takes to bed. Well built, easy to attach, and most importantly, nothing has fallen off of it!
customer_reviews.author: Lash

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty sturdy as well
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for my son in college and he loves them. He sleep s on the top bunk so he can keep his phone and glasses close at night. They are pretty sturdy as well. He used one to put his computer monitor on for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Seabee9320

customer_reviews.title: Very deserving of 5 stars - might just buy another one
customer_reviews.text: This thing was perfect for my needs. We rearranged the bedroom and there wasn't much room between my side of the bed and the door. This shelf was the perfect size and is very sturdy. Perfect balance of forces. My dad was engineer and this shelf is like something he would have built for me if he were still alive. This is the highest praise I can give to any product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E Munro

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hard plastic so it’s not soft. But I didn’t want it to be. It’s very useful in my dorm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to look for something like this. My son has a loft bed - this is perfect for his glasses, a drink, tissues, and the remote control. It is plastic, but is sturdy. Ordering one for my college kid too!
customer_reviews.author: PAMom

customer_reviews.title: Works as a great little shelf
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this to my bed rail to keep things handy at night. I wear rx glasses so it's nice to be able to reach in the same place for my stuff without knocking stuff off the night stand
customer_reviews.author: Monkey fighter level2

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat idea and attaches without a problem. However, we have all hit our heads on the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not only for bunk beds
customer_reviews.text: My son got rid of the loft bed but he has it on his sleigh bed and it works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We bought the bunk buddy bedside shelf and it is exactly what we expected; it is as described. It’s lightweight, fits well, and is easy to reposition as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Note it has 2 spots to clip to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Note it has 2 spots to clip to bed. Some on the market only have one and they tip very easily. My daughter lofted her bed at school and loves that she has this. The edges are high enough that things don't accidentally slide off.
customer_reviews.author: busymomof3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a college student
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son who is a freshman in college and he's said it's the number one thing he's thankful he took with him. Having a lofted bed means no side table for water, phone, or an alarm clock and this is the solution! It was easy to install on his dorm bed and he hasn't had any issues with it so far. Great product for the price and perfect for any lofted bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed...
customer_reviews.text: Such a great item! It's lightweight, but sturdy enough to hold what is needed (book light, small cup of water, tablet, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: MLove80

customer_reviews.title: Cool product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. We bought our son a bunk bed but he really needed somewhere for his alarm clock and maybe a cup of water and this was perfect. He has had it for almost a year now and its held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Kbrooke22

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf for any situation
customer_reviews.text: Great shelf for any situation. I like the materials and mounting it was easy. I just with the had a few holes at the end to put cables thru.

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice to know what the demensions are for the clasp
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to know what the demensions are for the clasp. Overpriced for what it is. Plastic

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for an upper bunk! My daughters had to share a room while my father in law stayed with us and my daughter was able to put a small fan on it, her water, and a flashlight with some room to spare. Worked wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Momofsix

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have one of those Ikea beds with drawers on all sides so a nightstand is out of the question. This is really freaking convenient

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my daughter’s dorm room – it attaches easily to the side of the bed frame and appears sturdy, and can hold a tablet, drink, and phone all at the same time.

customer_reviews.title: Every loft needs this
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is easy to set up and holds a decent amount. Look no further and buy this shelf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my sons phone, laptop and remote control kept falling off of his loft bed... problem solved

customer_reviews.title: Works in any bed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son's dorm room and it's great. There is an adjustment to tighten it on the bar so it fits wherever you need it to. Perfect for close quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Reads

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good shelf
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day in my dorm room. Great shelf for attaching to a college bed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn't give it five is that I can only attach it to the long rails. The head and foot boards are too thick. Otherwise it's great.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Given 3 as gifts to relatives with loft or captain's beds too high for end tables -- all 3 find the shelf a sturdy convenient place to put their phone, water bottle and tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: Thriftstore Addict

customer_reviews.title: What do you want?  It's a shelf.
customer_reviews.text: It's flat with a good rim to prevent roll off, clamps on tightly & holds stuff. It's a shelf - it's great. Only time will tell whether or not it can decipher the genetic code.
customer_reviews.author: Essay

customer_reviews.title: Works great on dorm bed
customer_reviews.text: Works great on dorm bed. THe first one I purchased was inexpensive and would not hold up, keep falling down had to return it. THis one works perfect! and I would reccommend it

customer_reviews.text: It may be overpriced but I use it every single day in my dorm. I usually keep a bottle of water, chapstick, and my phone on it.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy for plastic. Clamps down tight with no shifting. I regularly have a 32oz water bottle, my phone, and chargers on it. This doesn't seem to strain the shelf at all.

customer_reviews.title: buy it you poor unfortunate soul

product_meta.title: Bunk Buddy Bedside Shelf - Black
product_meta.description: Solution Enterprises, LLC manufactures and distributes the Bunk Buddy tray. The Bunk Buddy is an easily attachable bedside tray designed for bunk beds and lofted beds with the college student in mind. The Bunk Buddy requires only the twist of a thumb to attach to any type bed frame up to 1.6" thick. Bunk Buddy is great for the college student who needs space for the IPad, computer, cell phone, alarm clock, water, etc. without leaving their bunk or lofted bed. Younger Children who may need things close by such as a cup of water, bedtime books and/or that favorite stuffed animal. Adults use it as a convenient and easily accessible night stand for glasses, medications, flashlights and many other items.
feature_bullets: Easily attachable Bedside Tray - No tools required.
Quick Set-up - Attaches in less than a minute.
College Lofted and Bunk Bed Shelf - Designed with the college student in mind.
Access to cell phone, laptop, drinks, alarm without getting out of bed.
Rugged Design - Built to last. The original bedside shelf.
